statements: UPDATE customer_purchase_history SET price = 25.99 WHERE customer_id = 123 AND purchase_date = '2022-01-15' AND item_purchased = 'Shoes';
UPDATE customer_purchase_history SET item_purchased = 'Hat', price = 12.50, purchase_date = '2022-02-28' WHERE customer_id = 456;
UPDATE customer_purchase_history SET price = 15.99, item_purchased = 'Shoes' WHERE customer_id = 123 AND purchase_date = '2021-10-15';
UPDATE customer_purchase_history SET item_purchased = 'Socks', price = 5.49 WHERE purchase_date = '2021-09-20' AND customer_id = 456;
